title: What are the situations wherein we can use philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: My opinion no situation, why think beyond yourself into that which is already. If the situation has to deal with a person, philosophy is used to try to read minds, but I don’t care what anyone is thinking why should I waste energy and time on what they are thinking when I am already experiencing what I’m thinking and what I’m doing and what I’m saying and what I’m going to do. Philosophy in my opinion is an act witchcraft.
